string-array.name: faqs6
string-array.item: Can cervical cancer be treated? If so, how?
Can HPV be treated? If so how?
Are medications used to treat cervical cancer?
Does HPV treatment affect daily activities such as farming or riding a motorbike?
How often does a woman need to be treated for HPV or cervical cancer?
Can cervical cancer advance to a point which it cannot be treated?
Can a hysterectomy be used to treat HPV?
How often does an HPV positive woman need to be treated?
Can a woman be re-infected with HPV if she has been treated?
